name: Ghosting The Party
description:
Try to leave a horrible party while maintaining your sanity.

This replayable game mixes varied conversations with challenging yet fun runner-like minigames. Try to get out of the party as the ghost, while enjoying the amazing art and chilling mood. Once done, be sure to try different dialogue routes (hint: you can skip some runs!).

Keep in check your mental stability while exploring the different options, and jump and dash to the exit!

Controls:

  • Jump (Z)
  • Dash (X)
  • Next (Z)
  • Select option (1, 2, 3  or Z, X, C)

Credits:

  • Art: Dre Otero
  • Code: Fer Gueler
  • Story: Manuel Burrell

Creative Commons Music by Jason Shaw on Audionautix.com
